all.description: Equivalent to the combination of all other contexts except for <value>tools_menu<value>.

all_message_attachments.description: Applies when the user context-clicks the summary of the message attachments of a displayed message with more than one attachment.

action.description: Applies when the user context-clicks a browserAction button in a Manifest V3 extension

action_menu.description: Applies when the user opened a browserAction button of type <value>menu</value> in a Manifest V3 extension.

audio.description: Applies when the user context-clicks an audio element.

browserAction.description: Applies when the user context-clicks a browserAction button in a Manifest V2 extension

browser_action_menu.description: Applies when the user opened a browserAction button of type <value>menu</value>.

compose_action_menu.description: Applies when the user opened a composeAction button of type <value>menu</value>.

compose_body.description: Applies when the user context-clicks in the compose editor.

editable.description: Applies when the user context-clicks an editable element, like a textarea.

folder_pane.description: Applies when the user context-clicks in the folder pane of the main Thunderbird window.

frame.description: Applies when the user context-clicks in a nested iframe.

image.description: Applies when the user context-clicks an image.

link.description: Applies when the user context-clicks on a link.

message_attachments.description: Applies when the user context-clicks a single attachment of a displayed message.

message_display_action_menu.description: Applies when the user opened a messageDisplayAction button of type <value>menu</value>.

message_list.description: Applies when the user context-clicks in the message list (a.k.a. thread pane) of the main Thunderbird window.

page.description: Applies when the user context-clicks in the page, but none of the other page contexts apply (for example, the click is not on an image or a nested iframe or a link).

password.description: Applies when the user context-clicks on a password input element.

selection.description: Applies when part of the page is selected.

tab.description: Applies when the user context-clicks on a tab (specifically, this refers to the tab-strip or other user interface element enabling the user to switch from one tab to another, not to the page itself).

video.description: Applies when the user context-clicks a video element.

compose_action.description: Applies when the user context-clicks a composeAction button.

message_display_action.description: Applies when the user context-clicks a messageDisplayAction button.

compose_attachments.description: Applies when the user context-clicks an attachment in the compose window.

tools_menu.description: Applies when the user opens the <value>Tools</value> menu of Thunderbird's main menu.
